title: has any woman fought for equal share of property under the succession law?
selftext:
how long did the legal process take and did they win?

It would be inspirational to know.

There is law and then there is reality. This article gives an overview of that [https://www.jagoinvestor.com/2013/01/women-and-her-right-in-inheritance.html](https://www.jagoinvestor.com/2013/01/women-and-her-right-in-inheritance.html)
